field.email.helper: A link to a password-reset form will be sent to this address.
field.email.label: Email
submit.error.text: An unknown error occurred during password-reset form creation. You may try again later.
submit.error.title: Password reset failed.
success.main: A link will be sent to {user}, if an account exists with this email. This link contains a single-usage temporary form to reset your password.
success.sub: If you fail to open and complete the form in time, you can always ask for a new one from this page. You may now leave this page, or proceed to login once you have reset your password.
success.title: Password-reset form created!
title: Password reset
